subject: Batch 4: Add metadata frontmatter to 6 SKILL.md files WITHOUT existing YAML frontmatter
description:
These 6 SKILL.md files do NOT have YAML frontmatter (no `---` delimiters). You need to ADD a YAML frontmatter block at the very beginning of each file.

For each file:
1. Read the file
2. Check if `metadata` field already exists -- if so, skip
3. Check if the file already has `---` delimited YAML frontmatter
4. If NO frontmatter exists, add the following at the very top of the file (BEFORE existing content):
```
---
metadata:
  author: masaaki-nagasawa
  version: 1.0.0
---

```
(note the blank line after closing ---)

5. The existing content (title, name, description etc.) must remain unchanged
6. Do NOT add `name` or `description` to the new frontmatter -- only add `metadata`

Files to process:
1. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/code-reviewer/SKILL.md
2. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/codebase-investigation/SKILL.md
3. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/data-deduplication/SKILL.md
4. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/file-encoding-converter/SKILL.md
5. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/text-parser-patterns/SKILL.md
6. /Users/masaaki_nagasawa/.claude/skills/x-scraping/SKILL.md

Report each file processed with success/skip/error status.
